name: The Rise and Fall of the Crystal Empire

bigPicture.premise: A civilization discovers how to harness crystalline energy, rises to unprecedented heights, and ultimately brings about its own destruction.
bigPicture.bookendStart: Scattered tribes discover the first crystal caverns
bigPicture.bookendEnd: The last crystal shatters, ending an age

focuses.name: The Nature of Power
focuses.description: How the pursuit and use of power corrupts even noble intentions

focuses.name: The Crystal Singers
focuses.description: Those who can communicate with crystals - are they blessed or cursed?

focuses.name: What Was Lost
focuses.description: The knowledge and wisdom sacrificed in the pursuit of progress

legacies.name: The Heartstone
legacies.description: The first and largest crystal ever found, said to contain the memories of the world

legacies.name: House Luminari
legacies.description: The founding dynasty of the Crystal Empire, their bloodline carries natural affinity for crystals

legacies.name: The Silent Order
legacies.description: A monastic order that guards the forbidden knowledge of crystal manipulation

periods.name: The Age of Discovery
periods.description: Tribal peoples discover the crystal caverns and learn to tap into their power

events.name: The First Light
events.description: A young shepherd girl accidentally awakens the Heartstone, revealing the crystals' potential

scenes.name: Voice in the Dark
scenes.description: Elen follows a lost lamb into the caverns and hears the crystal sing for the first time
scenes.question: How does the crystal communicate its knowledge?
scenes.answer: Through haunting melodies that plant visions directly in the mind - beautiful but overwhelming for the unprepared

events.name: The Gathering of Tribes
events.description: The scattered peoples unite under the promise of crystal power, forming the first alliance

periods.name: The Golden Empire
periods.description: The Crystal Empire reaches its zenith, with crystal-powered cities and wonders beyond imagination

events.name: The Crowning of the First Emperor
events.description: Theron Luminari unites all the crystal houses and establishes the Empire

scenes.name: The Oath of the Houses
scenes.description: Each house lord swears fealty, binding their bloodlines to the Heartstone
scenes.question: What does House Shadowmere demand in exchange for their loyalty?
scenes.answer: They demand the right to study the 'silent crystals' - those that refuse to sing - a request everyone else finds troubling

events.name: The Construction of Prismatica
events.description: The capital city is built entirely from living crystal, a marvel that draws pilgrims from every land

events.name: The Singer's Plague
events.description: Crystal Singers begin dying mysteriously, their minds shattered by the crystals they once communed with

scenes.name: The Last Song of Maera
scenes.description: The Empire's greatest Singer gives a final performance before her mind fractures
scenes.question: What warning does Maera deliver in her final song?
scenes.answer: She sings of 'the silence that hungers' and begs them to 'let the crystals sleep' - but the audience only applauds, thinking it artistic metaphor

periods.name: The War of Shadows
periods.description: House Shadowmere's experiments unleash something terrible, and the Empire tears itself apart

events.name: The Awakening of the Silent Ones
events.description: The 'dead' crystals that House Shadowmere studied were not dead - they were imprisoned entities

scenes.name: The Breaking of the Seal
scenes.description: Lord Shadowmere performs the ritual to 'awaken' the largest silent crystal
scenes.question: What was imprisoned in the silent crystals?
scenes.answer: An ancient consciousness that predates humanity - it doesn't hate them, but it cannot exist alongside their kind. Its very presence unravels minds and turns crystals into weapons against their wielders.

events.name: The Shattering of Prismatica
events.description: The capital city's crystal structures turn against their inhabitants in a single night of horror

events.name: The Silent Order Emerges
events.description: Survivors of the Singer caste form a secret order, seeking a way to contain the awakened entity

scenes.name: The Founding Vow
scenes.description: Seven surviving Singers make a pact that will guide their order for generations
scenes.question: What terrible sacrifice does the Silent Order's founding vow require?
scenes.answer: They must give up their ability to hear the crystals' songs forever, becoming immune to the entity's influence but cut off from the source of their power

periods.name: The Long Twilight
periods.description: The remnants of civilization struggle to survive as crystal after crystal goes dark

events.name: The Last Luminari
events.description: Princess Vera Luminari discovers she can hear both the crystals AND the entity - she may be the key to ending the conflict

scenes.name: The Choice
scenes.description: Vera stands before the Heartstone, facing an impossible decision
scenes.question: What choice does Vera face?
scenes.answer: She can merge with the Heartstone to imprison the entity again, but she would become just like it - conscious but unable to exist alongside humanity. Her family line would end, and she would watch her people for eternity, never able to touch them again.

events.name: The Final Song
events.description: Vera makes her choice, and the crystals fall silent forever
